title: Wind Farm Aviation Impact Assessment
description: A developer must file a notice with the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) for a new wind farm and assess its potential impact on aviation.

tasks.description: Gather the precise coordinates and maximum tip height for every proposed wind turbine.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles the required location and height data.

tasks.description: Submit a 'Notice of Proposed Construction or Alteration' to the FAA using their online portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully files the required notice with the FAA.

tasks.description: Check for proximity to any airports or military training routes that could be affected.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a small, private airfield within 5 miles of the project.

tasks.description: Based on the FAA's feedback, determine the required nighttime lighting for the turbines.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the specific type of red flashing lights required for the turbines.
